# The `DroppedVariableStatsIR` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A class to collect and print dropped debug information due to LLVM IR optimization passes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A class to collect and print dropped debug information due to LLVM IR optimization passes.

After every LLVM IR pass is run, it will print how many #dbg&#95;values were dropped due to that pass.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/droppedvariablestatsir-h">DroppedVariableStatsIR.h</a>.
